snippet: The Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia, or FARC, handed over the soldier to the International Committee of the Red Cross.
abstract: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia releases Cristian Moscoso, soldier held for two weeks, day before unilateral cease-fire declared by group is set to start.
lead_paragraph: The Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia, or FARC, handed over the soldier to the International Committee of the Red Cross.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Colombia: Rebels Free Captured Soldier
